snippet: Across Silicon Valley, venture capitalists, entrepreneurs and former colleagues broadcast their enthusiasm for Marissa Mayer, the new chief executive of Yahoo, even as investor reaction was tepid.
abstract: Across Silicon Valley, venture capitalists, entrepreneurs and former colleagues broadcast their enthusiasm for Marissa Mayer, the new chief executive of Yahoo, even as investor reaction was tepid.

headline.main: As Silicon Valley Cheers Yahoo Chief, Wall Street's Reaction Is Muted
